sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' export default function Contact() { const formRef = useRef() const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false) const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs .sendForm( 'service_kd8b1m8', // replace with your EmailJS service ID 'template_ya2qcv6', // replace with your EmailJS template ID formRef.current, 'D-9hxmFbirQt7Sgof' // replace with your EmailJS public key ) .then( () => { setSubmitted(true) }, (error) => { alert('Failed to send message. Please try again.') console.error(error) } ) } if (submitted) { return (

Thank you for contacting us!

We will get back to you shortly.

) } return (

Contact Us
